attributes.action: To make it a criminal offence for people/children to play ball games & skateboarding/blades/boots in the road
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is becoming more common to find children playing in the road these days,not only is it dangerous for them but they also cause a lot of damage to parked cars without any care what-so-ever,and the police say that they are powerless to do anything(or don't care!).
